> Moments later Salveo and his team had geared up and were
> aboard the newly-repaired shuttle heading for the ark.
> 
> "Maximal team to Lord Elder.  We are en ro ute to your position,
> ETA half a cycle." said the pilot into the radio.

Lord Elder nodded to himself, as he spoke into the mike, "Affirmative. Be aware there are disabled sweeps everywhere. they should be safely deactivated, but keep on your guard. A few may have a few amps of firepower left in them."

Elder continued to work on his control panel, working to get at least minimal defenses back up and running. What he wouldn't give for Legacy's shields right now, but he would have to make due with what he had. He smiled as a few weapon batteries began to show ready lights. it was not much, but it was something. 

(TAG: Salveo, Any)

Preston
